name: Vietnam Impression 8 days
description: his tour gives you the oportunity to enjoy your vacation in the best destinations of Vietnam from the South to the North. See the very best of Vietnam on a highlights tour designed to give you just enough time to savour your travel experience at a leisurely pace. Starting in the South, discover the country’s bustling capital and its historic monuments before heading north for a visit to Central and Northern Vietnam and all its tropical delights.
